Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: are we contributing art auction to Hyperledger? If not, this does not belong in this JIRA. ~bmos299 ~ibm.hlfab.aha.jira

Action.author: bmos299
Action.body: The application has been ported to 1.0. I think we just need to add some documentation around it. What do you think ~ibmmark ~nickgaski ?

Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: Is IT People contributing art auction to Hyperledger? If not, please close this as not a Hyperledger story

Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: What is the status of this? ~Clayton Sims maybe you can track down whether IT People plan to contribute art auction as a sample app?
